CustomField.formula: IF( (!ISBLANK( Customer_Feedback_Hold_Start_time__c ) && !ISBLANK( Customer_Feedback_Hold_End_time__c )) , (( Customer_Feedback_Hold_End_time__c - Customer_Feedback_Hold_Start_time__c ) * 24+ IF( ISBLANK(Past_Customer_Feedback_in_Hours__c),0,Past_Customer_Feedback_in_Hours__c )) , IF( (!ISBLANK( Customer_Feedback_Hold_Start_time__c ) && ISBLANK( Customer_Feedback_Hold_End_time__c )), (( now() - Customer_Feedback_Hold_Start_time__c ) * 24+ IF( ISBLANK(Past_Customer_Feedback_in_Hours__c),0,Past_Customer_Feedback_in_Hours__c )),0))
CustomField.label: Waiting for Customer Feedback in Hours
